name: Compact Java UI for J2ME
short_description: Compact Java UI is a lightweight UI lib with ability to display diverse UI components on all kinds of cell phone screens. It is compact, low-memory required, but highly agile and flexible. It is very easy to use Compact Java UI, just as using Swing compo
